trans-unit.source: params_csv (bool) – Set to False to encode list values in query string params by specifying multiple instances of the parameter (e.g., ‘thing=1&thing=2&thing=3’). Otherwise, parameters will be encoded as comma-separated values (e.g., ‘thing=1,2,3’). Defaults to True.

trans-unit.source: parse_qs_csv – Set to False in order to disable splitting query parameters on , (default True). Depending on the user agent, encoding lists as multiple occurrences of the same parameter might be preferable. In this case, setting parse_qs_csv to False will cause the framework to treat commas as literal characters in each occurring parameter value.
trans-unit.target: parse_qs_csv -设置为 False 以禁止拆分查询参数上 , （默认 True ）。根据用户代理的不同，将列表编码为多次出现相同的参数可能更可取。在这种情况下，将 parse_qs_csv 设置为 False 将使框架在每个出现的参数值中将逗号视为文字字符。

trans-unit.source: resource – An object with responder methods, following the naming convention on_*, that correspond to each method the resource supports. For example, if a resource supports GET and POST, it should define on_get(self, req, resp) and on_post(self, req, resp).
trans-unit.target: 资源 –具有响应者方法的对象，遵循命名约定on_ *，对应于资源支持的每种方法。例如，如果资源支持GET和POST，则应定义 on_get(self, req, resp) 和 on_post(self, req, resp) 。

trans-unit.source: resource (instance) – Object which represents a REST resource. Falcon will pass “GET” requests to on_get, “PUT” requests to on_put, etc. If any HTTP methods are not supported by your resource, simply don’t define the corresponding request handlers, and Falcon will do the right thing.
trans-unit.target: 资源（实例）–代表REST资源的对象。Falcon会将“ GET”请求传递给on_get，将“ PUT”请求传递给on_put，等等。如果您的资源不支持任何HTTP方法，则只需不定义相应的请求处理程序，Falcon会做正确的事情。

trans-unit.source: resource (instance) – Object which represents a REST resource. Falcon will pass GET requests to on_get(), PUT requests to on_put(), etc. If any HTTP methods are not supported by your resource, simply don’t define the corresponding request handlers, and Falcon will do the right thing.
trans-unit.target: 资源（实例）–代表REST资源的对象。Falcon会将GET请求传递给 on_get() ，将PUT请求传递给 on_put() ，等等。如果您的资源不支持任何HTTP方法，则只需不定义相应的请求处理程序，Falcon会做正确的事情。

trans-unit.source: resource (instance) – Object which represents a REST resource. The default maps the HTTP method GET to on_get(), POST to on_post(), etc. If any HTTP methods are not supported by your resource, simply don’t define the corresponding request handlers, and Falcon will do the right thing.
trans-unit.target: 资源（实例）–代表REST资源的对象。默认值将HTTP方法 GET 映射到 on_get() ，将 POST 映射到 on_post() 等。如果您的资源不支持任何HTTP方法，则只需不定义相应的请求处理程序，Falcon会做正确的事情。

trans-unit.source: suffix (str) – Optional responder name suffix for this route. If a suffix is provided, Falcon will map GET requests to on_get_{suffix}(), POST requests to on_post_{suffix}(), etc.
trans-unit.target: 后缀（str）–此路由的可选响应者名称后缀。如果提供了后缀，Falcon会将GET请求映射到 on_get_{suffix}() ，将POST请求 on_post_{suffix}() 到on_post_ {suffix}（）等。

trans-unit.source: suffix (str) – Optional responder name suffix for this route. If a suffix is provided, Falcon will map GET requests to on_get_{suffix}(), POST requests to on_post_{suffix}(), etc. In this way, multiple closely-related routes can be mapped to the same resource. For example, a single resource class can use suffixed responders to distinguish requests for a single item vs. a collection of those same items. Another class might use a suffixed responder to handle a shortlink route in addition to the regular route for the resource.
trans-unit.target: 后缀（str）–此路由的可选响应者名称后缀。如果提供了后缀，Falcon会将GET请求映射到 on_get_{suffix}() ，将POST请求 on_post_{suffix}() 到on_post_ {suffix}（）等。通过这种方式，可以将多个紧密相关的路由映射到同一资源。例如，单个资源类可以使用带后缀的响应者来区分对单个项目的请求与这些相同项目的集合。除了资源的常规路由外，另一类可能还使用后缀的响应者来处理短链接路由。

trans-unit.source: A 303 response to a GET request indicates that the origin server does not have a representation of the target resource that can be transferred over HTTP. However, the Location header in the response may be dereferenced to obtain a representation for an alternative resource. The recipient may find this alternative useful, even though it does not represent the original target resource.
trans-unit.target: 对GET请求的303响应表明,源服务器没有可以通过HTTP传输的目标资源的表示。然而,响应中的Location头可以被取消引用,以获得一个替代资源的表示。接收者可能会发现这个替代资源很有用,即使它不代表原始目标资源。

trans-unit.source: A 404 status code does not indicate whether this lack of representation is temporary or permanent; the 410 Gone status code is preferred over 404 if the origin server knows, presumably through some configurable means, that the condition is likely to be permanent.
trans-unit.target: 404状态码并不表明这种缺乏表示是暂时性的还是永久性的;如果起源服务器知道,大概通过一些可配置的手段知道这种情况可能是永久性的,那么410 Gone状态码比404更受欢迎。

trans-unit.source: Any additional args and kwargs not defined above are passed through to the underlying router’s add_route() method. The default router does not expect any additional arguments, but custom routers may take advantage of this feature to receive additional options when setting up routes.
trans-unit.target: 上面未定义的所有其他args和kwargs都会传递到基础路由器的 add_route() 方法。默认路由器不需要任何其他参数，但是自定义路由器可以在设置路由时利用此功能来接收其他选项。

trans-unit.source: Any additional keyword arguments not defined above are passed through to the underlying router’s add_route() method. The default router ignores any additional keyword arguments, but custom routers may take advantage of this feature to receive additional options when setting up routes. Custom routers MUST accept such arguments using the variadic pattern (**kwargs), and ignore any keyword arguments that they don’t support.
trans-unit.target: 上面未定义的所有其他关键字参数都将传递到基础路由器的 add_route() 方法。默认路由器会忽略任何其他关键字参数，但是自定义路由器可能会在设置路由时利用此功能来接收其他选项。自定义路由器必须使用可变参数模式（ **kwargs ）接受此类参数，并忽略它们不支持的任何关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: As illustrated above, by default, all process_response methods will be executed, even when a process_request, process_resource, or resource responder raises an error. This behavior is controlled by the API class’sindependent_middleware keyword argument.
trans-unit.target: 如上所述，默认情况下，即使process_request，process_resource或资源响应器引发错误，也会执行所有process_response方法。此行为由API类的 independent_middleware 关键字参数控制。

trans-unit.source: As you can see, Resource is just a regular class. You can name the class anything you like. Falcon uses duck-typing, so you don’t need to inherit from any sort of special base class.

trans-unit.source: As you can see, the bulk of the setup logic has been moved to create_app(), which can be used to obtain an API object either for testing or for hosting in production. get_app() takes care of instantiating additional resources and configuring the application for hosting.
trans-unit.target: 如您所见，大部分设置逻辑已移至 create_app() ，可用于获取API对象以进行测试或在生产中托管。 get_app() 负责实例化其他资源并配置用于托管的应用程序。

For now, run the tests again and watch to make sure they fail. A key step in the TDD workflow is verifying that your tests do not pass before moving on to the implementation:

trans-unit.source: As you can see, we generate a unique name for the image, and then write it out by reading from req.stream. It’s called stream instead of body to emphasize the fact that you are really reading from an input stream; by default Falcon does not spool or decode request data, instead giving you direct access to the incoming binary stream provided by the WSGI server.
trans-unit.target: 如您所见，我们为图像生成一个唯一的名称，然后通过从 req.stream 读取将其写出。它被称为 stream 而不是 body 以强调您实际上是从输入流中读取的事实。默认情况下，Falcon不会假脱机或解码请求数据，而是使您直接访问WSGI服务器提供的传入二进制流。

trans-unit.source: As you can see, we renamed Resource to Collection and added a new Item class to represent a single image resource. Also, note the name parameter for the on_get() responder. Any URI parameters that you specify in your routes will be turned into corresponding kwargs and passed into the target responder as such. We’ll see how to specify URI parameters in a moment.
trans-unit.target: 如您所见，我们将 Resource 重命名为 Collection ,并添加了一个新的 Item 类来表示单个图像资源。另外，请注意 on_get() 响应者的 name 参数。您在路由中指定的任何URI参数都将变成相应的kwarg，并按原样传递给目标响应器。稍后我们将介绍如何指定URI参数。

trans-unit.source: As you can see, we renamed Resource to Collection and added a new Item class to represent a single image resource. Alternatively, these two classes could be consolidated into one by using suffixed responders. (See also: add_route())

trans-unit.source: By default, ensure_ascii is passed to the json.dumps function. If you override the dumps function, you will need to explicitly set ensure_ascii to False in order to enable the serialization of Unicode characters to UTF-8. This is easily done by using functools.partial to apply the desired keyword argument. In fact, you can use this same technique to customize any option supported by the dumps and loads functions:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， ensure_ascii 传递给 json.dumps 功能。如果覆盖 dumps 功能，则需要将 ensure_ascii 显式设置为 False 才能将Unicode字符序列化为UTF-8。通过使用 functools.partial 来应用所需的关键字参数，可以轻松完成此操作。实际上，您可以使用相同的技术来自定义 dumps 和 loads 功能支持的任何选项：

trans-unit.source: By default, Falcon does not consume request bodies. However, setting the auto_parse_form_urlencoded to True on an instance of falcon.API will cause the framework to consume the request body when the content type is application/x-www-form-urlencoded, making the form parameters accessible via params, get_param(), etc.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，猎鹰不使用请求正文。但是，在 falcon.API 实例上将 auto_parse_form_urlencoded 设置为 True 时，当内容类型为 application/x-www-form-urlencoded 时，框架将消耗请求主体，从而使表单参数可通过 params ， get_param() 进行访问。等等

trans-unit.source: By default, Falcon enables the secure cookie attribute. Therefore, if you are testing your app over HTTP (instead of HTTPS), the client will not send the cookie in subsequent requests.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Falcon启用 secure cookie属性。因此，如果您通过HTTP（而不是HTTPS）测试应用程序，则客户端将不会在后续请求中发送cookie。

trans-unit.source: By default, Falcon normalizes incoming URI paths to simplify later processing and improve the predictability of application logic. This behavior can be disabled via the strip_url_path_trailing_slash request option.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Falcon标准化传入的URI路径以简化以后的处理并提高应用程序逻辑的可预测性。可以通过 strip_url_path_trailing_slash 请求选项禁用此行为。

trans-unit.source: By default, Falcon sets the secure attribute for cookies. This instructs the client to never transmit the cookie in the clear over HTTP, in order to protect any sensitive data that cookie might contain. If a cookie is set, and a subsequent request is made over HTTP (rather than HTTPS), the client will not include that cookie in the request.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Falcon设置cookie 的 secure 属性。这指示客户端永远不要通过HTTP清除传输cookie，以保护cookie可能包含的任何敏感数据。如果设置了cookie，并且通过HTTP（而不是HTTPS）发出了后续请求，则客户端将不在请求中包含该cookie。

trans-unit.source: By default, the framework installs two handlers, one for HTTPError and one for HTTPStatus. These can be overridden by adding a custom error handler method for the exception type in question.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，框架会安装两个处理程序，一个用于 HTTPError ，另一个用于 HTTPStatus 。可以通过为有问题的异常类型添加自定义错误处理程序方法来覆盖这些异常。

trans-unit.source: Central to both REST and the Falcon framework is the concept of a “resource”. Resources are simply all the things in your API or application that can be accessed by a URL. For example, an event booking application may have resources such as “ticket” and “venue”, while a video game backend may have resources such as “achievements” and “player”.
trans-unit.target: REST和Falcon框架的核心是“资源”的概念。资源只是API或应用程序中可以通过URL访问的所有内容。例如，事件预订应用程序可以具有诸如“门票”和“场地”的资源，而视频游戏后端可以具有诸如“成就”和“玩家”的资源。

trans-unit.source: Conflicts are most likely to occur in response to a PUT request. For example, if versioning were being used and the representation being PUT included changes to a resource that conflict with those made by an earlier (third-party) request, the origin server might use a 409 response to indicate that it can’t complete the request. In this case, the response representation would likely contain information useful for merging the differences based on the revision history.
trans-unit.target: 响应PUT请求最有可能发生冲突。例如，如果使用版本控制，并且PUT表示形式包含对资源的更改，该更改与早期（第三方）请求所做的更改冲突，则原始服务器可能会使用409响应来指示它无法完成请求。在这种情况下，响应表示可能包含基于修订历史记录合并差异的有用信息。

trans-unit.source: Each resource class defines various “responder” methods, one for each HTTP method the resource allows. Responder names start with on_ and are named according to which HTTP method they handle, as in on_get(), on_post(), on_put(), etc.
trans-unit.target: 每个资源类都定义了各种“响应者”方法，对于资源所允许的每种HTTP方法，一个。响应者名称以 on_ 开头，并根据其处理的HTTP方法进行命名，例如 on_get() ， on_post() ， on_put() 等。

trans-unit.source: Each responder in a resource receives a Request object that can be used to read the headers, query parameters, and body of the request. You can use the standard help() function or IPython’s magic ? function to list the attributes and methods of Falcon’s Request class:
trans-unit.target: 资源中的每个响应者都会收到一个 Request 对象，该对象可用于读取标头，查询参数和请求的正文。您可以使用标准 help() 函数或IPython的魔力 ? 列出Falcon的 Request 类的属性和方法的函数：

trans-unit.source: Earlier we pointed out that our POST test relied heavily on mocking, relying on assumptions that may or may not hold true as the code evolves. To mitigate this problem, we’ll not only have to refactor the tests, but also the application itself.
trans-unit.target: 前面我们指出，我们的POST测试在很大程度上依赖于模拟，它依赖于随着代码的发展而可能成立或未成立的假设。为了减轻这个问题，我们不仅必须重构测试，还必须重构应用程序本身。

trans-unit.source: Easy access to headers and bodies through request and response classes
trans-unit.target: 通过请求和响应类轻松访问头和主体。

trans-unit.source: Either a file-like object with a read() method that takes an optional size argument and returns a block of bytes, or an iterable object, representing response content, and yielding blocks as byte strings. Falcon will use wsgi.file_wrapper, if provided by the WSGI server, in order to efficiently serve file-like objects.
trans-unit.target: 带有 read() 方法的类文件对象（采用可选的size参数并返回一个字节块），或者一个可迭代的对象（表示响应内容），并以字节字符串形式产生块。如果由WSGI服务器提供，Falcon将使用wsgi.file_wrapper，以便有效地提供类似文件的对象。

trans-unit.source: Error Handling
trans-unit.target: 错误处理

trans-unit.source: Error handlers are matched in LIFO order. In other words, when searching for an error handler to match a raised exception, and more than one handler matches the exception type, the framework will choose the one that was most recently registered. Therefore, more general error handlers (e.g., for the standard Exception type) should be added first, to avoid masking more specific handlers for subclassed types.
trans-unit.target: 错误处理程序按LIFO顺序进行匹配。换句话说，当搜索错误处理程序以匹配引发的异常，并且有多个处理程序匹配异常类型时，框架将选择最近注册的处理程序。因此，应首先添加更通用的错误处理程序（例如，用于标准 Exception 类型的错误处理程序），以避免掩盖子类类型的更具体的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Error handlers may be registered for any exception type, including HTTPError or HTTPStatus. This feature provides a central location for logging and otherwise handling exceptions raised by responders, hooks, and middleware components.
trans-unit.target: 可以为任何异常类型（包括 HTTPError 或 HTTPStatus )注册错误处理程序。此功能提供了一个中心位置，用于记录和处理响应者，挂钩和中间件组件引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Error handlers may be registered for any type, including HTTPError. This feature provides a central location for logging and otherwise handling exceptions raised by responders, hooks, and middleware components.
trans-unit.target: 错误处理程序可以注册为任何类型，包括 HTTPError 。此功能提供了一个中心位置，用于记录和处理响应者，挂钩和中间件组件引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Error handlers may be registered for any type, including HTTPError. This feature provides a central location for logging and otherwise handling exceptions raised by responders, hooks, and middleware components.
trans-unit.target: 错误处理程序可以注册为任何类型，包括 HTTPError 。此功能提供了一个中心位置，用于记录和处理响应者，挂钩和中间件组件引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Error title to send to the client.
trans-unit.target: 要发送给客户端的错误标题。

trans-unit.source: Errors are anticipated, detected, and handled appropriately within each responder and with the aid of custom error handlers.
trans-unit.target: 在每个响应者内部并在自定义错误处理程序的帮助下,对错误进行预测、检测和适当处理。

trans-unit.source: Errors are anticipated, detected, logged, and handled appropriately within each responder or by global error handling hooks.
trans-unit.target: 在每个响应者内部或通过全局错误处理钩子对错误进行预测、检测、记录和适当处理。

trans-unit.source: Falcon

trans-unit.source: Falcon lives on GitHub, making the code easy to browse, download, fork, etc. Pull requests are always welcome! Also, please remember to star the project if it makes you happy. :)
trans-unit.target: Falcon 驻留在GitHub上，从而使代码易于浏览，下载，派生等。始终欢迎拉取请求！另外，如果让您满意，请记住为项目加注星标。:)

trans-unit.source: Falcon middleware components can also be used to insert logic before and after requests. However, unlike hooks, middleware components are triggered globally for all requests.
trans-unit.target: Falcon 中间件组件还可用于在请求之前和之后插入逻辑。但是，与钩子不同，中间件组件是针对所有请求全局触发的。

trans-unit.source: Falcon License
trans-unit.target: 猎鹰许可证

trans-unit.source: Falcon add-ons and complementary packages
trans-unit.target: 猎鹰附加组件和补充套餐

trans-unit.source: Falcon allows for easy and customizable internet media type handling. By default Falcon only enables a single JSON handler. However, additional handlers can be configured through the falcon.RequestOptions and falcon.ResponseOptions objects specified on your falcon.API.
trans-unit.target: Falcon允许轻松和可自定义的Internet媒体类型处理。默认情况下，Falcon仅启用单个JSON处理程序。然而，更多的处理器可以通过配置 falcon.RequestOptions 和 falcon.ResponseOptions 对象在您指定的 falcon.API 。

trans-unit.source: Falcon also fully supports CPython 2.6-2.7, and 3.3+.
trans-unit.target: Falcon还完全支持CPython 2.6-2.7和3.3+。

trans-unit.source: Falcon also fully supports CPython 2.7 and 3.5+.
trans-unit.target: Falcon还完全支持CPython 2.7和3.5+。

trans-unit.source: Falcon also provides a generic HTTPStatus class. Raise this class from a hook, middleware, or a responder to stop handling the request and skip to the response handling. It takes status, additional headers and body as input arguments.
trans-unit.target: Falcon还提供了一个通用的 HTTPStatus 类。从挂钩，中间件或响应器中引发此类，以停止处理请求并跳至响应处理。它以状态，附加头和正文作为输入参数。

trans-unit.source: Falcon also supports more complex parameterized path segments that contain multiple values. For example, a version control API might use the following route template for diffing two code branches:
trans-unit.target: Falcon还支持包含多个值的更复杂的参数化路径段。例如,一个版本控制API可以使用以下路径模板来区别两个代码分支。

trans-unit.source: Falcon apps work with any WSGI server, and run great under CPython 2.7, PyPy, and CPython 3.3+.
trans-unit.target: Falcon应用程序可以在任何WSGI服务器上工作,并在CPython 2.7、PyPy和CPython 3.3+下运行良好。

trans-unit.source: Falcon apps work with any WSGI server, and run like a champ under CPython 2.7/3.5+ and PyPy.
trans-unit.target: Falcon应用程序可以在任何WSGI服务器上工作,在CPython 2.7/3.5+和PyPy下运行得很好。

trans-unit.source: Falcon attempts to serialize the HTTPError instance using its to_json() or to_xml() methods, according to the Accept header in the request. If neither JSON nor XML is acceptable, no response body will be generated. You can override this behavior if needed via set_error_serializer().
trans-unit.target: Falcon尝试根据请求中的Accept标头使用其 to_json() 或 to_xml() 方法序列化 HTTPError 实例。如果JSON和XML都不可接受，则不会生成响应主体。您可以根据需要通过 set_error_serializer() 覆盖此行为。

trans-unit.source: Falcon can process a list of tuple slightly faster than a dict.
trans-unit.target: Falcon可以比 dict 更快地处理 tuple 列表。

trans-unit.source: Falcon can process a list of tuples slightly faster than a dict.
trans-unit.target: Falcon可以比dict稍快地处理一个元组列表。

trans-unit.source: Falcon conforms to the standard WSGI protocol that most Python web applications have been using since 2003. If you have deployed Python applications like Django, Flask, or others, you will find yourself quite at home with Falcon and your standard Apache/mod_wsgi, gunicorn, or other WSGI servers should suffice.
trans-unit.target: Falcon符合自2003年以来大多数Python Web应用程序一直使用的标准WSGI协议。如果您已部署Django，Flask等Python应用程序，则您会发现Falcon以及标准的Apache / mod_wsgi，gunicorn，或其他WSGI服务器就足够了。

trans-unit.source: Falcon currently only provides a JSON Schema media validator; however, JSON Schema is very versatile and can be used to validate any deserialized media type that JSON also supports (i.e. dicts, lists, etc).
trans-unit.target: Falcon目前只提供了JSON Schema媒体验证器;然而,JSON Schema的用途非常广泛,可用于验证JSON也支持的任何反序列化媒体类型(即dicts、list等)。

trans-unit.source: Falcon currently only supports partial negotiation out of the box. By default, when the media attribute is used it attempts to de/serialize based on the Content-Type header value. The missing link that Falcon doesn’t provide is the connection between the falcon.RequestAccept header provided by a user and the falcon.ResponseContent-Type header.
trans-unit.target: Falcon当前仅支持部分协商。默认情况下，使用 media 属性时，它将尝试根据 Content-Type 标头值进行反序列化。 Falcon没有提供的缺少的链接是用户提供的 falcon.Request Accept 标头和 falcon.Response Content-Type 标头之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: Falcon defaults to treating commas in a query string as literal characters delimiting a comma separated list. For example, given the query string ?c=1,2,3, Falcon defaults to adding this to your request.params dictionary as {'c': ['1', '2', '3']}. If you attempt to use JSON in the value of the query string, for example ?c={'a':1,'b':2}, the value will get added to your request.params in a way that you probably don’t expect: {'c': ["{'a':1", "'b':2}"]}.
trans-unit.target: Falcon默认将查询字符串中的逗号视为分隔逗号分隔列表的文字字符。例如，给定查询字符串 ?c=1,2,3 ，Falcon默认将其作为 {'c': ['1', '2', '3']} 添加到您的 request.params 字典中。如果您尝试在查询字符串的值中使用JSON，例如 ?c={'a':1,'b':2} ，则该值将以您可能不希望使用的方式添加到您的 request.params 中'不期望： {'c': ["{'a':1", "'b':2}"]} 。

trans-unit.source: Falcon defines a set of exceptions that can be raised within a middleware method, hook, or responder in order to trigger a 3xx (Redirection) response to the client. Raising one of these classes short-circuits request processing in a manner similar to raising an instance or subclass of HTTPError
trans-unit.target: Falcon定义了一组异常，可以在中间件方法，挂钩或响应器中引发这些异常，以触发对客户端的3xx（重定向）响应。引发这些类之一 HTTPError 请求处理短路，类似于引发HTTPError的实例或子类。

trans-unit.source: Falcon depends on six and python-mimeparse. python-mimeparse is a better-maintained fork of the similarly named mimeparse project. Normally the correct package will be selected by Falcon’s setup.py. However, if you are using an alternate strategy to manage dependencies, please take care to install the correct package in order to avoid errors.
trans-unit.target: Falcon依赖于 six 和 python-mimeparse 。 python-mimeparse 是类似命名的 mimeparse 项目的一个维护更好的分支。通常，正确的软件包将由Falcon的 setup.py 选择。但是，如果您使用替代策略来管理依赖关系，请小心安装正确的软件包，以避免错误。

trans-unit.source: Falcon does not currently support parsing files submitted by an HTTP form (multipart/form-data), although we do plan to add this feature in a future version. In the meantime, you can use the standard cgi.FieldStorage class to parse the request:
trans-unit.target: Falcon目前不支持解析HTTP表单（ multipart/form-data ）提交的文件，尽管我们确实计划在将来的版本中添加此功能。同时，您可以使用标准的 cgi.FieldStorage 类来解析请求：

trans-unit.source: Falcon does not require the installation of any other packages, although if Cython has been installed into the environment, it will be used to optimize the framework as explained above.
trans-unit.target: Falcon不需要安装任何其他包,尽管如果环境中已经安装了Cython,它将被用来优化框架,如上所述。

trans-unit.source: Falcon expects form-encoded request bodies to be encoded according to the standard W3C algorithm (see also http://goo.gl/6rlcux).
trans-unit.target: Falcon期望根据标准W3C算法对表单编码的请求主体进行编码（另请参见http://goo.gl/6rlcux）。

trans-unit.source: Falcon generally tries to minimize the number of objects that it instantiates. It does this for two reasons: first, to avoid the expense of creating the object, and second to reduce memory usage by reducing the total number of objects required under highly concurrent workloads. Therefore, when adding a route, Falcon requires an instance of your resource class, rather than the class type. That same instance will be used to serve all requests coming in on that route.
trans-unit.target: Falcon通常尝试最小化实例化的对象数量。这样做有两个原因：首先，避免创建对象的开销；其次，通过减少高并发工作负载下所需的对象总数，减少内存使用量。因此，在添加路线时，猎鹰需要资源类的实例，而不是类类型。该实例将用于处理该路由上的所有请求。

trans-unit.source: Falcon generally tries to minimize the number of objects that it instantiates. It does this for two reasons: first, to avoid the expense of creating the object, and second to reduce memory usage. Therefore, when adding a route, Falcon requires an instance of your resource class, rather than the class type. That same instance will be used to serve all requests coming in on that route.
trans-unit.target: Falcon通常尝试最小化实例化的对象数量。这样做有两个原因：第一，避免创建对象的开销，第二，减少内存使用量。因此，在添加路线时，猎鹰需要资源类的实例，而不是类类型。该实例将用于处理该路由上的所有请求。

trans-unit.source: Falcon is a WSGI framework and as such does not serve HTTP requests directly. However, you can get most of the benefits of HTTP/2 by simply deploying any HTTP/2-compliant web server or load balancer in front of your app to translate between HTTP/2 and HTTP/1.1. Eventually we expect that Python web servers (such as uWSGI) will support HTTP/2 natively, eliminating the need for a translation layer.
trans-unit.target: Falcon是一个WSGI框架,因此不直接服务于HTTP请求。然而,你可以通过简单地在你的应用程序前部署任何HTTP/2兼容的Web服务器或负载平衡器来获得HTTP/2的大部分好处,以便在HTTP/2和HTTP/1.1之间进行翻译。最终,我们希望Python Web服务器(如uWSGI)能够原生支持HTTP/2,从而消除对翻译层的需求。

trans-unit.source: Falcon is a minimalist WSGI library for building speedy web APIs and app backends. We like to think of Falcon as the Dieter Rams of web frameworks.
trans-unit.target: Falcon是一个简约的WSGI库，用于构建快速的Web API和应用程序后端。我们喜欢将Falcon视为Web框架的 Dieter Rams 。

trans-unit.source: Falcon is designed for applications that require a high level of customization or performance tuning. The framework’s minimalist design frees the developer to select the best strategies and 3rd-party packages for the task at hand.
trans-unit.target: Falcon专为需要高度定制或性能调整的应用程序而设计。该框架的极简设计使开发人员可以为手头的任务选择最佳策略和第三方软件包。

trans-unit.source: Falcon is released under the terms of the Apache 2.0 License. This means that you can use it in your commercial applications without having to also open-source your own code. It also means that if someone happens to contribute code that is associated with a patent, you are granted a free license to use said patent. That’s a pretty sweet deal.
trans-unit.target: Falcon是根据Apache 2.0许可条款发行的。这意味着您可以在商业应用程序中使用它，而不必同时开源自己的代码。这也意味着，如果有人偶然贡献了与专利相关的代码，则将授予您使用该专利的免费许可。那是一笔非常可观的交易。

trans-unit.source: Falcon is used around the world by a growing number of organizations, including:
trans-unit.target: 越来越多的组织在世界各地使用Falcon,包括:

trans-unit.source: Falcon makes it easy to efficiently serve static files by simply assigning an open file to resp.streamas demonstrated in the tutorial. You can also serve an entire directory of files via falcon.API.add_static_route(). However, if possible, it is best to serve static files directly from a web server like Nginx, or from a CDN.
trans-unit.target: Falcon只需简单地将一个打开的文件分配给 resp.stream ，就可以轻松有效地为静态文件提供服务，如本教程所示。您还可以通过 falcon.API.add_static_route() 提供整个文件目录。但是，如果可能的话，最好直接从Web服务器（例如Nginx）或CDN提供静态文件。

trans-unit.source: Falcon provides a list of constants for common HTTP response status codes.
trans-unit.target: Falcon提供了用于常见HTTP响应状态代码的常量列表。

trans-unit.source: Falcon provides a number of constants for common status codes. They all start with the HTTP_ prefix, as in: falcon.HTTP_204.
trans-unit.target: Falcon为常见状态码提供了许多常量。它们都以 HTTP_ 前缀开头，例如： falcon.HTTP_204 。

trans-unit.source: Falcon provides a number of exception classes that can be raised to redirect the client to a different location (see also Redirection).
trans-unit.target: Falcon提供了许多异常类，可以引发这些异常类以将客户端重定向到其他位置（另请参见Redirection）。

trans-unit.source: Falcon routes incoming requests to resources based on a set of URI templates. If the path requested by the client matches the template for a given route, the request is then passed on to the associated resource for processing.
trans-unit.target: Falcon根据一组URI模板将传入的请求路由到资源。如果客户端请求的路径与给定路由的模板相匹配,那么请求就会被传递给相关资源进行处理。

trans-unit.source: Falcon skips processing the response body when, according to the HTTP spec, no body should be returned. If the client sends a HEAD request, the framework will always return an empty body. Falcon will also return an empty body whenever the response status is any of the following:
trans-unit.target: 当根据HTTP规范,不应该返回任何body时,Falcon会跳过处理响应body。如果客户端发送一个HEAD请求,框架将始终返回一个空body。只要响应状态是以下任何一种,Falcon也会返回一个空体。

trans-unit.source: Falcon speaks WSGI, and so in order to serve a Falcon app, you will need a WSGI server. Gunicorn and uWSGI are some of the more popular ones out there, but anything that can load a WSGI app will do.
trans-unit.target: Falcon讲的是WSGI,所以为了服务Falcon应用,你需要一个WSGI服务器。Gunicorn和uWSGI是一些比较流行的,但任何能加载WSGI应用的都可以。

trans-unit.source: Falcon supports testing its API object by simulating HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: Falcon支持通过模拟HTTP请求来测试其 API 对象。

trans-unit.source: Falcon supports before and after hooks. You install a hook simply by applying one of the decorators below, either to an individual responder or to an entire resource.

trans-unit.source: Falcon tries to do as little as possible while remaining highly effective.
trans-unit.target: 猎鹰在保持高效的同时,尽量少做事。

trans-unit.source: Falcon uses Python classes to represent resources. In practice, these classes act as controllers in your application. They convert an incoming request into one or more internal actions, and then compose a response back to the client based on the results of those actions.
trans-unit.target: Falcon 使用 Python 类来表示资源。在实践中,这些类在您的应用程序中充当控制器。它们将传入的请求转换为一个或多个内部动作,然后根据这些动作的结果组成响应返回给客户端。

trans-unit.source: Falcon will convert any instance or subclass of HTTPError raised by a responder, hook, or middleware component into an appropriate HTTP response. The default error serializer supports both JSON and XML. If the client indicates acceptance of both JSON and XML with equal weight, JSON will be chosen. Other media types may be supported by overriding the default serializer via set_error_serializer().
trans-unit.target: Falcon会将由响应者，挂钩或中间件组件引发的 HTTPError 的任何实例或子类转换为适当的HTTP响应。默认错误序列化程序支持JSON和XML。如果客户端指示以相等的权重接受JSON和XML，则将选择JSON。通过 set_error_serializer() 覆盖默认的序列化器，可以支持其他媒体类型。

trans-unit.source: Falcon will format the datetime as an HTTP date string.
trans-unit.target: Falcon会将 datetime 格式化为HTTP日期字符串。

trans-unit.source: Falcon will re-raise errors that do not inherit from HTTPError unless you have registered a custom error handler for that type (see also: falcon.API).
trans-unit.target: 除非您已经为该类型注册了一个自定义错误处理程序，否则Falcon会重新引发那些不会从 HTTPError 继承的错误（另请参见：falcon.API）。

trans-unit.source: Falcon will re-raise errors that do not inherit from falcon.HTTPError unless you have registered a custom error handler for that type.

trans-unit.source: Falcon’s default router uses Python classes to represent resources. In practice, these classes act as controllers in your application. trans-unit.source: File-like input object for reading the body of the request, if any. This object provides direct access to the server’s data stream and is non-seekable. In order to avoid unintended side effects, and to provide maximum flexibility to the application, Falcon itself does not buffer or spool the data in any way.
trans-unit.target: 类似于文件的输入对象，用于读取请求的正文（如果有）。该对象提供对服务器数据流的直接访问，并且是不可搜索的。为了避免意外的副作用并为应用程序提供最大的灵活性，Falcon本身不会以任何方式缓冲或缓冲数据。

trans-unit.source: File-like wrapper around stream to normalize certain differences between the native input objects employed by different WSGI servers. In particular, bounded_stream is aware of the expected Content-Length of the body, and will never block on out-of-bounds reads, assuming the client does not stall while transmitting the data to the server.
trans-unit.target: 围绕 stream 的类似文件的包装程序，以规范不同WSGI服务器采用的本机输入对象之间的某些差异。特别是， bounded_stream 知道主体的预期Content-Length，并且在客户端将数据传输到服务器时不会停滞的情况下，绝不会在越界读取时进行阻止。

trans-unit.source: Functional tests define the application’s behavior from the outside. trans-unit.source: Hooks and middleware components can be used together to authenticate and authorize requests. For example, a middleware component could be used to parse incoming credentials and place the results in req.context. Downstream components or hooks could then use this information to authorize the request, taking into account the user’s role and the requested resource.
trans-unit.target: 挂钩和中间件组件可以一起用于验证和授权请求。例如，可以使用中间件组件来解析传入的凭据并将结果放置在 req.context 中。然后，下游组件或挂钩可以使用此信息来授权请求​​，同时考虑到用户的角色和所请求的资源。

trans-unit.source: If ujson is available, Falcon will use it to speed up media (de)serialization, error serialization, and query string parsing. Note that ujson can actually be slower on PyPy than the standard json module due to ctypes overhead, and so we recommend only using ujson with CPython deployments:
trans-unit.target: 如果ujson可用，Falcon将使用它来加快媒体（反序列化），错误序列化和查询字符串解析的速度。请注意，由于ctypes的开销，在PyPy上 ujson 实际上比标准 json 模块要慢，因此我们建议仅在CPython部署中使用 ujson ：

trans-unit.source: If resp.status is not set explicitly, it defaults to 200 OK, which is exactly what we want on_get() to do.
trans-unit.target: 如果未明确设置 resp.status ，则默认值为 200 OK ，这正是我们希望 on_get() 进行的操作。

trans-unit.target: 如果JSON Schema不能满足你的需求,可以用类似于上面的方式实现一个自定义验证器。

trans-unit.source: If a custom media type is used and the type includes a “+json” or “+xml” suffix, the default serializer will convert the error to JSON or XML, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用自定义媒体类型，并且该类型包含“ + json”或“ + xml”后缀，则默认的序列化程序会将错误分别转换为JSON或XML。

trans-unit.source: If a query param does not have a value, Falcon will by default ignore that parameter. For example, passing 'foo' or 'foo=' will result in the parameter being ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果查询参数没有值，Falcon默认情况下将忽略该参数。例如，传递 'foo' 或 'foo=' 将导致参数被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If an HTML form is POSTed to the API using the application/x-www-form-urlencoded media type, Falcon can automatically parse the parameters from the request body and merge them into the query string parameters. To enable this functionality, set auto_parse_form_urlencoded to True via API.req_options.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用application / x-www-form-urlencoded媒体类型将HTML表单发布到API ，Falcon可以自动从请求正文中解析参数并将其合并为查询字符串参数。要启用此功能，请通过 API.req_options 将 auto_parse_form_urlencoded 设置为 True 。

trans-unit.source: If an HTML form is POSTed to the API using the application/x-www-form-urlencoded media type, and the auto_parse_form_urlencoded option is set, the framework will consume stream in order to parse the parameters and merge them into the query string parameters. In this case, the stream will be left at EOF.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用application / x-www-form-urlencoded媒体类型将HTML表单发布到API ，并且设置了 auto_parse_form_urlencoded 选项，则框架将使用 stream 以解析参数并将其合并到查询字符串参数中。在这种情况下，流将保留在EOF。

trans-unit.source: If an existing project is making extensive use of dictionary contexts, the type can be explicitly overridden back to dict by employing custom request/response types:
trans-unit.target: 如果现有的项目大量使用字典上下文,那么可以通过使用自定义的请求/响应类型将该类型显式地覆盖回 dict。

trans-unit.source: If an iterable of exception types is specified instead of a single type, the handler must be explicitly specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了异常类型的迭代,而不是单一类型,则必须明确指定处理程序。

trans-unit.source: If authentication credentials were provided in the request, the server considers them insufficient to grant access. The client SHOULD NOT automatically repeat the request with the same credentials. The client MAY repeat the request with new or different credentials. However, a request might be forbidden for reasons unrelated to the credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果在请求中提供了认证凭证,服务器认为这些凭证不足以允许访问。客户端不应该用相同的凭证自动重复请求。客户端可以用新的或不同的凭证重复请求。但是,请求可能会因为与凭证无关的原因而被禁止。

trans-unit.source: If available, uses testtools in lieu of unittest.
trans-unit.target: 如果可用，请使用 testtools 代替 unittest 。

trans-unit.source: If available, uses testtools in lieu of unittest.
trans-unit.target: 如果可用，请使用 testtools 代替 unittest 。

trans-unit.target: 如果一切顺利,你应该看到这样的东西。

trans-unit.source: If no route matches a request, but the path in the requested URI matches a sink prefix, Falcon will pass control to the associated sink, regardless of the HTTP method requested.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有路由与请求相匹配,但请求的URI中的路径与sink前缀相匹配,则无论请求的HTTP方法如何,Falcon都会将控制权传递给相关的sink。

trans-unit.source: If no route matches the request, control then passes to a default responder that simply raises an instance of HTTPNotFound.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有路由与请求匹配，则控制权传递给仅引发 HTTPNotFound 实例的默认响应器。

trans-unit.source: If no route matches the request, control then passes to a default responder that simply raises an instance of HTTPNotFound. Normally this will result in sending a 404 response back to the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有路由与请求匹配，则控制权传递给仅引发 HTTPNotFound 实例的默认响应器。通常，这将导致向客户端发送404响应。

trans-unit.source: If none of the above headers are available, or if the Forwarded header is available but the “host” parameter is not included in the first hop, the value of host is returned instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果以上标头均不可用，或者转发标头不可用，但第一跳中未包含“主机”参数，则会返回 host 值。

trans-unit.source: If none of these headers are available, or if the Forwarded header is available but does not contain a “proto” parameter in the first hop, the value of scheme is returned instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果这些标头都不可用，或者如果Forwarded标头不可用，但在第一跳中不包含“ proto”参数，则返回 scheme 的值。

trans-unit.source: If none of these headers are available, the value of remote_addr is used instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果这些头文件均不可用，则改用 remote_addr 的值。

trans-unit.source: If not set explicitly, the status defaults to ‘200 OK’.
trans-unit.target: 如果未明确设置，则状态默认为“ 200 OK”。

trans-unit.source: If one of the process_request middleware methods raises an error, it will be processed according to the error type. If the type matches a registered error handler, that handler will be invoked and then the framework will begin to unwind the stack, skipping any lower layers. The error handler may itself raise an instance of HTTPError, in which case the framework will use the latter exception to update the resp object. Regardless, the framework will continue unwinding the middleware stack. For example, if mob2.process_request were to raise an error, the framework would execute the stack as follows:
trans-unit.target: 如果process_request中间件方法之一引发错误，则将根据错误类型对其进行处理。如果类型与已注册的错误处理程序匹配，则将调用该处理程序，然后框架将开始展开堆栈，并跳过所有较低的层。错误处理程序本身可能会引发HTTPError实例，在这种情况下，框架将使用后一个异常来更新resp对象。无论如何，该框架将继续展开中间件堆栈。例如，如果mob2.process_request引发错误，则框架将按以下方式执行堆栈：

trans-unit.source: If one of the process_request middleware methods raises an exception, it will be processed according to the exception type. If the type matches a registered error handler, that handler will be invoked and then the framework will begin to unwind the stack, skipping any lower layers. The error handler may itself raise an instance of HTTPError or HTTPStatus, in which case the framework will use the latter exception to update the resp object.
trans-unit.target: 如果process_request中间件方法之一引发异常，则将根据异常类型对其进行处理。如果类型与已注册的错误处理程序匹配，则将调用该处理程序，然后框架将开始展开堆栈，并跳过所有较低的层。错误处理程序本身可能会引发 HTTPError 或 HTTPStatus 的实例，在这种情况下，框架将使用后一个异常来更新resp对象。

trans-unit.source: If pytest reports any errors, take a moment to fix them up before proceeding to the next section of the tutorial.
trans-unit.target: 如果 pytest 报告了任何错误,请花点时间修复它们,然后再继续下一节教程。

trans-unit.source: If range requests are not supported for the target resource, the header may be set to “none” to advise the client not to attempt any such requests.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标资源不支持范围请求，则可以将标头设置为“无”以建议客户端不要尝试任何此类请求。

trans-unit.source: If set to a Unicode type (unicode in Python 2, or str in Python 3), Falcon will encode the text as UTF-8 in the response. If the content is already a byte string, use the data attribute instead (it’s faster).
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为Unicode类型（Python 2中为 unicode 或Python 3中为 str ），Falcon将在响应中将文本编码为UTF-8。如果内容已经是字节字符串，请改用 data 属性（速度更快）。

trans-unit.source: If the above approach isn’t an option for your deployment, you can implement a simple WSGI wrapper that does the same thing:
trans-unit.target: 如果上述方法不是您的部署选择，则可以实现一个简单的WSGI包装器，该包装器可以完成相同的操作：

trans-unit.source: If the condition is temporary, the server SHOULD generate a Retry- After header field to indicate that it is temporary and after what time the client MAY try again.
trans-unit.target: 如果条件是临时性的,服务器应该生成一个Retry-After头字段,以表明它是临时性的,以及在什么时间之后客户端可以再次尝试。

trans-unit.source: If the header already exists, the new value will be appended to it, delimited by a comma. Most header specifications support this format, Set-Cookie being the notable exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 如果头已经存在,新的值将被附加到它上面,用逗号分隔。大多数头规范都支持这种格式,Set-Cookie是明显的例外。

trans-unit.source: If the header already exists, the new value will normally be appended to it, delimited by a comma. The notable exception to this rule is Set-Cookie, in which case a separate header line for each value will be included in the response.
trans-unit.target: 如果头已经存在,新的值通常会被附加到它上面,用逗号分隔。这个规则的明显例外是Set-Cookie,在这种情况下,每个值都会在响应中包含一个单独的头行。

trans-unit.source: If the header was not previously set, nothing is done (no error is raised).
trans-unit.target: 如果之前没有设置头,则不做任何操作(不会出现错误)。

trans-unit.source: If the header was not previously set, nothing is done (no error is raised). Otherwise, all values set for the header will be removed from the response.
trans-unit.target: 如果之前没有设置header,则不做任何事情(不会出现错误),否则,所有为header设置的值将从响应中删除。否则,所有为头设置的值将从响应中移除。

trans-unit.source: If the hostname in the request is an IP address, the value for subdomain is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求中的主机名是IP地址，则 subdomain 的值未定义。

trans-unit.source: If the origin server does not know, or has no facility to determine, whether or not the condition is permanent, the status code 404 Not Found ought to be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果源服务器不知道或没有设施确定这种情况是否是永久性的,则应使用状态码404 Not Found代替。

trans-unit.source: If the prefix overlaps a registered route template, the route will take precedence and mask the sink.
trans-unit.target: 如果前缀与已注册的路由模板重叠,则路由将优先并掩盖下沉。

trans-unit.source: If the request included authentication credentials, then the 401 response indicates that authorization has been refused for those credentials. The user agent MAY repeat the request with a new or replaced Authorization header field. If the 401 response contains the same challenge as the prior response, and the user agent has already attempted authentication at least once, then the user agent SHOULD present the enclosed representation to the user, since it usually contains relevant diagnostic information.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求中包含认证凭证,那么401响应表明这些凭证的授权被拒绝。用户代理可以使用新的或替换的授权头字段重复请求。如果401响应包含了与之前响应相同的挑战,并且用户代理已经至少尝试过一次认证,那么用户代理应该向用户展示所附的表示,因为它通常包含相关的诊断信息。

trans-unit.source: If the request was proxied, the scheme may not match what was originally requested by the client. forwarded_scheme can be used, instead, to handle such cases.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求被代理，则该方案可能与客户端最初请求的方案不匹配。可以使用 forwarded_scheme 处理此类情况。

trans-unit.source: If the stream is set to an iterable object that requires resource cleanup, it can implement a close() method to do so. The close() method will be called upon completion of the request.
trans-unit.target: 如果流被设置为一个需要资源清理的可迭代对象,它可以实现一个close()方法来清理。close()方法将在请求完成后被调用。

trans-unit.source: If the stream length is unknown, you can set stream directly, and ignore content_length. In this case, the WSGI server may choose to use chunked encoding or one of the other strategies suggested by PEP-3333.
trans-unit.target: 如果流长度未知，则可以直接设置 stream ，而忽略 content_length 。在这种情况下，WSGI服务器可以选择使用分块编码或PEP-3333建议的其他策略之一。

trans-unit.source: If the stream length is unknown, you can set stream directly, and ignore stream_len. In this case, the WSGI server may choose to use chunked encoding or one of the other strategies suggested by PEP-3333.
trans-unit.target: 如果流长度未知，则可以直接设置 stream ，而忽略 stream_len 。在这种情况下，WSGI服务器可以选择使用分块编码或PEP-3333建议的其他策略之一。

trans-unit.source: If the value is malformed and can not be converted, Falcon will reject the request with a 404 response to the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果值是畸形的,无法转换,Falcon将以404响应给客户端拒绝该请求。

trans-unit.target: 如果您是Windows用户，则可以使用Waitress代替Gunicorn，因为后者在Windows下不起作用：

trans-unit.source: If you are deploying to PyPy, we recommend sticking with the standard library’s JSON implementation, since it will be faster in most cases as compared to a third-party library.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要部署到PyPy，建议您坚持使用标准库的JSON实现，因为在大多数情况下，它比第三方库要快。

trans-unit.source: If you are interested in the design-first approach mentioned above, you may also want to check out API design and gateway services such as Tyk, Apiary, Amazon API Gateway, or Google Cloud Endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 如果你对上面提到的设计优先的方法感兴趣,你也可以查看API设计和网关服务,如Tyk、Apiary、Amazon API Gateway或Google Cloud Endpoints。

trans-unit.source: If you are using the Falcon framework for a community or commercial project, please consider adding your information to our wiki under Who’s Using Falcon?
trans-unit.target: 如果您将Falcon框架用于社区或商业项目，请考虑在“ 谁在使用Falcon？”下将您的信息添加到我们的Wiki 。

trans-unit.source: If you are working on a remote server, switch to the myproject user and pull down the source code for your application.
trans-unit.target: 如果你是在远程服务器上工作,切换到myproject用户,并拉下你的应用程序的源代码。

trans-unit.source: If you do not know the size of the stream in advance, you can work around that by using chunked encoding, but that’s beyond the scope of this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: 如果您事先不知道流的大小，则可以使用分块编码来解决该问题，但这超出了本教程的范围。

trans-unit.source: If you have a lot of experience with other Python web frameworks, you may be used to using decorators to set up your routes. Falcon’s particular approach provides the following benefits:
trans-unit.target: 如果您对其他Python Web框架有丰富的经验，则可能习惯于使用装饰器来设置路由。猎鹰的特殊方法具有以下优点：

trans-unit.source: If you have access to your load balancer or reverse proxy configuration, we recommend setting up path or subdomain-based rules to split requests between your original implementation and the parts that have been migrated to Falcon (e.g., by adding an additional location directive to your NGINX config).

trans-unit.source: If your app sets strip_url_path_trailing_slash to True, Falcon will normalize incoming URI paths to simplify later processing and improve the predictability of application logic. This can be helpful when implementing a REST API schema that does not interpret a trailing slash character as referring to the name of an implicit sub-resource, as traditionally used by websites to reference index pages.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的应用程序将 strip_url_path_trailing_slash 设置为 True ，则Falcon将标准化传入的URI路径，以简化以后的处理并提高应用程序逻辑的可预测性。当实现REST API架构时，该API不会将斜杠字符解释为引用隐式子资源的名称，这很有用，因为网站通常会使用它来引用索引页面。

trans-unit.source: If your resource does not support a particular HTTP method, simply omit the corresponding responder and Falcon will use a default responder that raises an instance of HTTPMethodNotAllowed when that method is requested. trans-unit.source: In addition to the standard HTML form-based method for specifying lists by repeating a given param multiple times, Falcon supports a more compact form in which the param may be given a single time but set to a list of comma-separated elements (e.g., ‘foo=a,b,c’).
trans-unit.target: 除了标准的基于HTML表单的方法（该方法通过多次重复给定参数来指定列表）之外，Falcon还支持一种更紧凑的表单，在该表单中，可以一次性给定参数，但将其设置为逗号分隔元素的 list （例如， 'foo = a，b，c'）。

trans-unit.source: In cases where the response content is a stream (readable file-like object), Falcon will not supply a Content-Length header to the WSGI server unless content_length is explicitly set. Consequently, the server may choose to use chunked encoding or one of the other strategies suggested by PEP-3333.
trans-unit.target: 在响应内容是流（可读文件状对象）的情况下，除非明确设置 content_length ,否则Falcon不会向WSGI服务器提供Content-Length标头。因此，服务器可以选择使用分块编码或PEP-3333建议的其他策略之一。

trans-unit.source: In the REST architectural style, the URL only identifies the resource; it does not specify what action to take on that resource. Instead, users choose from a set of standard methods. For HTTP, these are the familiar GET, POST, HEAD, etc. Clients can query a resource to discover which methods it supports.
trans-unit.target: 在REST架构风格中,URL只标识资源;它并不指定对该资源采取什么操作。相反,用户可以从一组标准方法中选择。对于HTTP来说,这些方法就是我们熟悉的GET、POST、HEAD等。客户端可以查询一个资源,发现它支持哪些方法。

trans-unit.source: In the meantime, we recommend using the battle-tested gevent library via Gunicorn or uWSGI to scale IO-bound services. meinheld has also been used successfully by the community to power high-throughput, low-latency services. Note that if you use Gunicorn, you can combine gevent and PyPy to achieve an impressive level of performance. (Unfortunately, uWSGI does not yet support using gevent and PyPy together.)

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: Installation

trans-unit.source: Installing one of the pre-built Falcon wheels is a great way to get up and running quickly. However, when deploying your application in production, you may wish to compile Falcon via Cython yourself, using the target system’s native toolchain.
trans-unit.target: 安装一个预制的Falcon车轮是快速启动和运行的好方法。但是，在生产中部署应用程序时，您可能希望使用目标系统的本机工具链通过Cython自己编译Falcon。

trans-unit.source: Installing the Falcon wheel is a great way to get up and running quickly in a development environment, but for an extra speed boost when deploying your application in production, Falcon can compile itself with Cython.
trans-unit.target: 安装Falcon轮子是在开发环境中快速启动和运行的好方法,但在生产中部署应用时,为了额外提升速度,Falcon可以用Cython自行编译。

trans-unit.source: It is best to execute the application as a different OS user than the one who owns the source code for your application. The application user should NOT have write access to your source. This mitigates the chance that someone could write a malicious Python file to your source directory through an upload endpoint you might define; when your application restarts, the malicious file is loaded and proceeds to cause any number of BadThings:sup:(tm) to happen.
trans-unit.target: 最好以与拥有应用程序源代码的用户不同的OS用户身份执行该应用程序。应用程序用户应不具有源写访问。这样可以减少有人通过您可能定义的上传端点将恶意Python文件写入您的源目录的机会；当您的应用程序重新启动时，恶意文件将被加载并继续导致任何数量的BadThings：sup：（tm）发生。

trans-unit.source: Its typical use is to avoid the “lost update” problem, where a client GETs a resource’s state, modifies it, and PUTs it back to the server, when meanwhile a third party has modified the state on the server, leading to a conflict. By requiring requests to be conditional, the server can assure that clients are working with the correct copies.
trans-unit.target: 它的典型用法是避免“丢失更新”问题，在这种情况下，客户端会获取资源的状态，然后对其进行修改，然后将其重新放置到服务器上，而此时第三方已在服务器上修改了状态，从而导致冲突。通过要求请求是有条件的，服务器可以确保客户端使用正确的副本。

trans-unit.source: Many developers choose to write tests like the above to sanity-check their application’s primary functionality, while leaving the bulk of testing to simulated requests and unit tests. These latter types of tests generally execute much faster and facilitate more fine-grained test assertions as compared to higher-level functional and system tests. That being said, testing strategies vary widely and you should choose the one that best suits your needs.
trans-unit.target: 许多开发人员选择编写类似于上述的测试来对应用程序的主要功能进行完整性检查，同时将大部分测试留给模拟请求和单元测试。与更高级别的功能测试和系统测试相比，后面这些类型的测试通常执行得更快，并有助于更细粒度的测试断言。也就是说，测试策略千差万别，您应该选择最适合自己需求的策略。

trans-unit.source: Middleware components provide a way to execute logic before the framework routes each request, after each request is routed but before the target responder is called, or just before the response is returned for each request. Components are registered with the middleware kwarg when instantiating Falcon’s API class.

trans-unit.source: NGINX and uWSGI can communicate via normal TCP (using an IP address) or UNIX sockets (using a socket file). TCP sockets are easier to set up and generally work for simple deployments. If you want to have finer control over which processes, users, or groups may access the uWSGI application, or you are looking for a bit of a speed boost, consider using UNIX sockets. uWSGI can automatically drop privileges with chmod-socket and switch users with chown-socket.
trans-unit.target: NGINX和uWSGI可以通过普通TCP（使用IP地址）或UNIX套接字（使用套接字文件）进行通信。TCP套接字更易于设置，并且通常可用于简单部署。如果您想更好地控制哪些进程，用户或组可以访问uWSGI应用程序，或者您希望提高速度，请考虑使用UNIX套接字。uWSGI可以使用 chmod-socket 自动放弃特权，并使用 chown-socket 切换用户。

trans-unit.source: NGINX is a powerful web server and reverse proxy and uWSGI is a fast and highly-configurable WSGI application server. Together, NGINX and uWSGI create a one-two punch of speed and functionality which will suffice for most applications. In addition, this stack provides the building blocks for a horizontally-scalable and highly-available (HA) production environment and the configuration below is just a starting point.
trans-unit.target: NGINX是一个强大的网络服务器和反向代理,uWSGI是一个快速和高配置的WSGI应用服务器。NGINX和uWSGI共同创造了速度和功能的双击,足以满足大多数应用的需求。此外,这个堆栈还为水平可扩展和高可用(HA)的生产环境提供了构件,下面的配置只是一个起点。

trans-unit.source: NGINX natively supports the uwsgi protocol, for efficiently proxying requests to uWSGI. In NGINX parlance, we will create an “upstream” and direct that upstream (via a TCP socket) to our now-running uWSGI application.
trans-unit.target: NGINX原生支持uwsgi协议，以有效地将请求代理到uWSGI。用NGINX的话来说，我们将创建一个“上游”并将该上游（通过TCP套接字）定向到我们现在正在运行的uWSGI应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Named groups are converted to kwargs and passed to the sink as such.
trans-unit.target: 已命名的组被转换为kwargs,并以这样的方式传递给汇。

trans-unit.source: New Request and Response objects are created for each incoming HTTP request. However, a single instance of each resource class attached to a route is shared among all requests. Therefore, as long as you are careful about the way responders access class member variables to avoid conflicts, your WSGI app should be thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 为每个传入的HTTP请求创建新的 Request 和 Response 对象。但是，附加到路由的每个资源类的单个实例在所有请求之间共享。因此，只要您注意响应者访问类成员变量的方式以避免冲突，您的WSGI应用程序就应该是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the above example, the WSGI callable is simple assigned to a variable, application, rather than being passed to a self-hosting WSGI server such as wsgiref.simple_server.make_server. trans-unit.source: Note that static routes are matched in LIFO order, and are only attempted after checking dynamic routes and sinks.

trans-unit.source: Note that the 511 response SHOULD NOT contain a challenge or the authentication interface itself, because clients would show the interface as being associated with the originally requested URL, which may cause confusion.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,511响应中不要包含挑战或认证接口本身,因为客户端会将接口显示为与最初请求的URL相关联,这可能会造成混淆。

trans-unit.source: Note the method signature. env and start_response are standard WSGI params. Falcon adds a thin abstraction on top of these params so you don’t have to interact with them directly.
trans-unit.target: 注意方法签名。 env 和 start_response 是标准的WSGI参数。Falcon在这些参数之上添加了一个稀疏的抽象，因此您不必直接与它们进行交互。

trans-unit.source: Note the use of falcon.HTTP_201 for setting the response status to “201 Created”. We could have also used the falcon.HTTP_CREATED alias. For a full list of predefined status strings, simply call help() on falcon.status_codes:
trans-unit.target: 注意使用 falcon.HTTP_201 将响应状态设置为“ 201 Created”。我们还可以使用 falcon.HTTP_CREATED 别名。有关预定义状态字符串的完整列表，只需在 falcon.status_codes 上调用 help() ：

trans-unit.source: Note the use of resp.data in lieu of resp.body. If you assign a bytestring to the latter, Falcon will figure it out, but you can realize a small performance gain by assigning directly to resp.data.
trans-unit.target: 注意使用 resp.data 代替 resp.body 。如果为后者分配一个字节字符串，Falcon会找出来，但是直接分配给 resp.data 可以实现较小的性能提升。

trans-unit.source: Note, however, that it is more efficient to handle permanent redirects directly with your web server, if possible, rather than placing additional load on your app for such requests.
trans-unit.target: 但是,请注意,如果可能的话,直接与您的 Web 服务器一起处理永久重定向会更有效,而不是为此类请求给您的应用程序增加额外的负载。

trans-unit.source: Note: The existence of the 503 status code does not imply that a server has to use it when becoming overloaded. Some servers might simply refuse the connection.
trans-unit.target: 注意:503状态码的存在并不意味着服务器在超载时必须使用它。有些服务器可能直接拒绝连接。

trans-unit.source: Now, before every call to that responder, Falcon will first invoke validate_image_type(). There isn’t anything special about this function, other than it must accept four arguments. Every hook takes, as its first two arguments, a reference to the same req and resp objects that are passed into responders. The resource argument is a Resource instance associated with the request. The fourth argument, named params by convention, is a reference to the kwarg dictionary Falcon creates for each request. params will contain the route’s URI template params and their values, if any.
trans-unit.target: 现在，在每次调用该响应者之前，Falcon将首先调用 validate_image_type() 。除了必须接受四个参数之外，此函数没有什么特别的。每个挂钩都将对传递给响应器的相同 req 和 resp 对象的引用作为其前两个参数。该 resource 的说法是与请求相关联的资源实例。第四个参数，按照惯例命名为 params ，是对Falcon为每个请求创建的kwarg词典的引用。 params 将包含路由的URI模板参数及其值（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: Only noop on_get() and on_post() responders are implemented; when overriding these, or adding additional responders in child classes, they can be decorated with the falcon.testing.capture_responder_args() hook in order to capture the req, resp, and params arguments that are passed to the responder. Responders may also be decorated with the falcon.testing.set_resp_defaults() hook in order to set resp properties to default status, body, and header values.
trans-unit.target: 仅实现noop on_get() 和 on_post() 响应程序；覆盖这些参数或在子类中添加其他响应者时，可以使用 falcon.testing.capture_responder_args() 挂钩修饰它们，以捕获传递给响应者的req，resp和params参数。响应者还可以使用 falcon.testing.set_resp_defaults() 挂钩进行修饰，以便将resp属性设置为默认状态，正文和标题值。

trans-unit.source: People usually fall into two camps when it comes to this question. The first camp likes to instantiate a config object and pass that around to the initializers of the resource classes so the data sharing is explicit. The second camp likes to create a config module and import that wherever it’s needed.
trans-unit.target: 关于这个问题，人们通常分为两个阵营。第一个阵营喜欢实例化配置对象，并将其传递给资源类的初始化程序，以便数据共享是明确的。第二阵营喜欢创建一个配置模块并将其导入到任何需要的地方。

trans-unit.source: Raw HTTP headers from the request with canonical dash-separated names. Parsing all the headers to create this dict is done the first time this attribute is accessed, and the returned object should be treated as read-only. Note that this parsing can be costly, so unless you need all the headers in this format, you should instead use the get_header() method or one of the convenience attributes to get a value for a specific header.
trans-unit.target: 来自请求的原始HTTP标头，以标准的破折号分隔。首次访问此属性时，将解析所有标头以创建此dict，并且应将返回的对象视为只读。请注意，这种解析的成本可能很高，因此除非您需要这种格式的所有标头，否则应改用 get_header() 方法或便捷属性之一来获取特定标头的值。
